name: Double points for F1 season finale!
description: Double points for F1 season finale! F1 News Date: 9/December/2014 Word count: 181 Buy now to publish this story within your website, newspaper or magazine! All stories delivered by email. Worldwide use. Edit/translate as required. This story includes quotes from an FIA statement. If you subscribe to our F1 News Feed you will automatically receive this story as part of your package. Opening paragraphs: The F1 World Championship is to award double points for the final race of the season, it has been announced. The change, one of a number of rule amendments announced on Monday by the FIA, is designed to “maximise focus on the Championship until the end of the campaign.”

name: F1 News Feed - 2013!
description: For just £199 you can receive every F1 story we write - for publishing within your website, newspaper or magazine - during the whole of 2013! No wonder the News Feeds are our most popular service. Those that subscribe at the start of the year will receive at least 80 F1 stories, which works out at less than £2.50 per story! There are no other costs or fees involved. It's the perfect (and cheapest) way to populate your website with quality news or to ensure that you have a steady stream of editorial to choose from for your newspaper or magazine. Once you have purchased the News Feed, you will automatically receive a full version of each future story uploaded onto the Motorsport-News-Service.com website, by email, until December 31, 2013. Active News feed customers can also publish stories, free of charge, from our F1 and MotoGP News Archive: www.motorsport-news-service.blogspot.com

name: News Archive - Read Only
description: Once a news story drops off the Motorsport-News-Service.com front page - and is thus no longer offered for sale - it can be viewed in full by visiting our F1 and MotoGP News Archive Blog: www.motorsport-news-service.blogspot.com Please note that only active News Feed customers can take stories from the Blog and use them elsewhere. However, race fans are welcome to view the Blog for reading purposes only. Stories usually appear on the Blog around 1-2 months after first being offered for sale on Motorsport-News-Service.com
